channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Orchard area by garage for company, 23rd July
item.description:
The grass in the orchard needs cutting it’s far to high and dogs are getting grass seeds in there paws

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven entrance going into the orchard area, 23rd July
item.description:
The tarmac entrance into the orchard area on Brookes Way by the garage door company has sunk down and is uneven for wheelchair and pram users and needs repair because it’s dangerous

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Holes in the grass on football pitch near goals, 23rd July
item.description:
There are big holes in the grass on the football pitch by the goals which need filling before someone twist their ankle .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brook Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tents multiplying, 23rd July
item.description:
Nearly 2 months ago I reported a tent. Predictably, despite being against the by laws, nothing was done about it. A few days ago the tent was moved to another location on the same path, leaving behind lots of rubbish and remains of fires. A second tent has now been erected, with more rubbish around it. Both tents need to be removed. As the occupants are lighting fires there's a severe fire risk.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bleak Hill Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
